DOC.brief_title: Influenza A/H5N1 Vaccine Clinical Trial ( IVACFLU-A/H5N1 ) - Phase 1
DOC.detailed_description: This phase 1 , double blind , randomize , placebo-controlled study . Seventy-six healthy male female adult , 18 30 year age , enrol trial . Subjects randomize one three treatment allocation : 32 subject 7.5 mcg/dose vaccine ( low dose ) , 32 subject 15 mcg/dose vaccine ( high dose ) 12 subject placebo . This sample size select enable least 30 evaluable subject group receive active vaccine . The study utilize `` block randomization '' assure balance 8:8:3 vaccine placebo subject enrol . The study double blind , mean study subject , investigator , sponsor unaware treatment allocate subject clinical trial database declare final lock . Since first-in-human study , injection study product sequential stagger safety evaluation sentinel cohort 19 subject remain 57 study subject 1st 2nd dos study . A sentinel group 19 participant ' enrollment vaccination precede remainder study group approximately 2-3 week . Product administration injection vaccine placebo sequential stagger .
DOC.criteria: Male female adult 18 30 year age enrollment visit . Literate willing provide write informed consent . Healthy adult , establish medical history screening evaluation , include physical examination . Capable willing complete diary card willing return followup visit . For female , willing utilize reliable birth control measure ( intrauterine device , hormonal contraception , condom ) Day 42 visit Known hypersensitivity ( vaccine egg ) Participating research study History asthma Chronic use immunosuppressant
